name: Day of the Tetraffids
description:
Minor Content Warning: Mild Bad Language

Oh no! The Tetraffids have escaped their containment! Navigate the office, dodge their deadly stingers, and find a way out in this short adventure game!

Controls:

Z/J - A Button

X/K - B Button

Arrow Keys - Directional Buttons

Shift - Start

Enter - Select

Day of the Tetraffids was made for GBJAM10.

Made by Goatkeeper_png

Music by Maddyline

Inspired by the works of John Wyndham

The downloadable ROM should work on Gameboy DMG emulators or flash carts.
